name: HockeyCountdown
0:
”Alexa ask Hockey Countdown how many days are left”
”Alexa ask Hockey Countdown for the countdown”
”Alexa tell Hockey Countdown to give me the days left”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hockey countdown
des: Most people love summer -- hockey fans know otherwise. The time between June and October is bleak. But now Alexa can help you count the days until hockey returns.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
